duties_responsibilities.duty: Test components and product together as a unit, or components separately according to approved test methods.
Write reports which include testing data, assessment of results, and recommendations for revisions to improve component performance.
Prepare Q.C.R. (Quality Control Requirement) for all components to ensure quality packages.
Assist with the determination of the root cause of packaging non-functional issues and incompatibilities.
Instruct and guide component suppliers for resolution to problematic components.
Report monthly status of Package Testing Requests (PTR’s)
Participate in supplier visits to enhance packaging knowledge and expertise.
Research new packaging materials, innovative components, and advise package engineers of findings.
Convert testing data to charts/graphs to report package testing results.
Close liaison with Developers to ensure correct prioritizing of work and early problem solving.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Packaging Engineering, Cosmetics Science, or related field
